titles: An answere vnto a wicked & infamous libel made by Christopher Vitel, one of the chiefe English elders of the pretended Family of Loue maintaining their doctrine, & carpingly answeringe to certaine pointes of a boke called the displaing of the Fam. Aunswered by I. Rogers.
author: Rogers, John, fl. 1560-1580.
Vitell, Christopher, fl. 1555-1579.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Daye dwelling ouer Aldersgate,
notes: Reprints and replies to a work of Vitell's, apparently no longer extant in its original publication.
At foot of title: Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Vitell, Christopher, fl. 1555-1579 --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Familists --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
